item.title: Budget airline Ryanair cuts passenger traffic goal again on Boeing delays
item.description: Budget airline Ryanair on Monday reported stronger-than-expected after-tax profit for the three months through to the end of December.

item.title: Twilio shares pop 20% for biggest gain since Covid pandemic on growth forecast
item.description: Twilio shares had their sharpest rally since 2020 on Friday after the company issued an uplifting forecast for the coming years at an investor event.

item.title: American Express CFO says spending picked up at year-end, thanks to millennials and Gen Z
item.description: The pickup was especially fueled by millennials and Gen Z users, who spent more on experiences such as travel and entertainment.

item.title: Burberry shares jump 13% after better-than-expected quarterly sales
item.description: Burberry on Friday reported a shallower-than-expected dip in sales in the fiscal third quarter, in the first glimpse of fresh efforts to revamp the be...

item.title: Boeing expects $4 billion loss for fourth quarter after chaotic 2024
item.description: Boeing outlined expected results and charges across its business in preliminary fourth-quarter results.
